column9: I had a lovely restaurant experience at Gastro Gaspari ! The 3-course dinner and the wine package were very tasty. The atmosphere, and very nice service from the owner Mathias with staff will add the extra points and make the visit worth "excellent"!

We spent a nice evening there eating a three-course dinner. Everything was excelllent. They even have their own import of wines, specially selected for the food they serve. This was really nice.
Very good service.
Becuse of the prices it is not an "everyday" restaurant,...More

column9: A rainy day a farmer friend of mine told me: Put on your rubberboots and your lipgloss. We are going for lunch! Through the gray lanscape we drove to Gaspari, where the fire was lit, the wine was served within minutes and lunch followed. And...More
We had a meeting for the council of a society while attending a meeting at Lund. It is a pleasant 15 minute ride from downtown Lund. The place is very nice and the food was good
